title: No more yesterdays
creator_credit: Martin Rolfe, Douglas Warth and British Pathe
brief_description: Ireland today - the modern and traditional elements of Irish life with its new industries and consequent prosperity. The changes which are progressive and varied have brought about a “new look” in an old land, improving the living standards of the people while retaining many of the old ways which we associate with Ireland. Commentary by Wilfrid Thomas.
